import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Sidenav from'../Sidenav';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{Row,Col}from'react-bootstrap';import{useCart}from'../../Cart/Cartcontext';import Topbar from'./Topbar';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Headdetails(){const[productData,setProductData]=useState(null);const{id}=useParams();const{addToCart}=useCart();useEffect(()=>{// Retrieve data from local storage
const retrievedData=localStorage.getItem('product2Datas');if(retrievedData){const product2Datas=JSON.parse(retrievedData);const foundProduct=product2Datas.find(e=>e.id===Number(id));setProductData(foundProduct);}},[id]);if(!productData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Product not found or loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Topbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidenav,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:10,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container d-flex justify-content-around align-items-center py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"data",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.brand}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.Frequency}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.Model}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.Connectivity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:productData.Price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-primary",onClick:()=>{addToCart(productData);},children:"Add to cart"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:productData.image,style:{width:"300px"},alt:productData.Model})})]})})]})]});}export default Headdetails;
